content: I'm theming a site which has images which, when hovered over, have the title slide up into view and you can click on that to go to another page (the image isn't a link, just the title (which is hidden until the image is hovered over)). I just realised that this won't work on touch devices though... Anyone know of an easy way to fix this?
Then it'd be a very boring website... :wink:
I'd say that the only way would be breakpoint/device detection and then selectively implementing the hover-over niceness on devices that have pointers.
